testcase.name: add new pet
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/requestBodyCreatePet.json') . passed * def responseBody = read ('classpath:Karate/createPet/responseCreatePet.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseBody ........................................ passed And assert response.id == requestBody.id .................................. passed And assert response.category.id ==requestBody.category.id ................. passed And assert response.category.name ==requestBody.category.name ............. passed And assert response.name ==requestBody.name ............................... passed And assert response.tags.id ==requestBody.tags.id ......................... passed And assert response.tags.name ==requestBody.tags.name ..................... passed And assert response.status ==requestBody.status ........................... passed
